title: Spicy Seitan Stir-Fry
shortDescription: Enjoy a flavorful and spicy stir-fry with seitan, a delicious plant-based protein.
fullDescription: Enjoy a flavorful and spicy stir-fry with seitan, a delicious plant-based protein. Packed with colorful vegetables and a tangy sauce.

instructionGroups.label: For the seitan
instructions: In a bowl, combine the sliced seitan, soy sauce, sriracha, and garlic powder.
Sprinkle cornstarch over the seitan and toss to coat evenly.
Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the seitan to the skillet and cook until crispy, stirring occasionally.
Remove the seitan from the skillet and set aside.

instructionGroups.label: For the stir-fry
instructions: In the same skillet, add the sliced bell peppers, onion, broccoli florets, julienned carrot, minced ginger, minced garlic, and red pepper flakes.
Stir-fry for a few minutes until the vegetables are crisp-tender.
In a small bowl, whisk together vegetable broth, soy sauce, and sesame oil.
Pour the sauce into the skillet with the vegetables and stir to coat.
Add the cooked seitan back to the skillet and toss to combine.
Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes to heat through.
Remove from heat and serve the spicy seitan stir-fry hot.

tips: Feel free to adjust the level of spiciness by increasing or decreasing the amount of sriracha and red pepper flakes.
Serve the stir-fry over cooked rice or noodles for a complete meal.
You can add other vegetables like snow peas or mushrooms for additional variety.
Garnish with chopped green onions and sesame seeds for added flavor and presentation.
